description: This fast and fabulous pasta recipe is perfect for a cosy night in. It's made with a rich meatball ragu that's full of flavour and is ready in just 20 minutes.
name: Pasta With Meatball Ragu Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500 g La Molisana pastificio extra di lusso paccarielli rigati
37 g Maggi lamb ragout recipe base

recipeInstructions.text: Add pasta to meatball mixture and toss gently to combine. Divide among bowls. Season with pepper and serve.
